amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 114-611 to prohibit any funds for delivering printed copies of the President's Budget to the office of any Member of the House of Representatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 114-611 to prohibit any funds for delivering printed copies of the President's Budget to the office of any Member of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
